Rhythmyx 6 Public API
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.percussion.ce

Class Summary
PSDependencyTree This class modifies the result document to append all child and paraent dependents of the current content item as a tree.
PSInlineImageSizeExtractor The purpose of this exit is to add image height and width as attributes to the root of result document.
PSRemoveControlChars This exit will remove all control characters from all fields in a content editor.
PSWepFixImages This class is a Rhythmyx pre-exit which examines incoming Xml, gets HTML content from 'wepbodyhtml' parameter; Parses it, then looks for all the 'img' tags and for each of those first checks whether height and width attributes are already set; if those are not set then it grabs the actual image, calculates its dimentions and sets width, height, rxwidth and rxheight on the img tag.
